description: Structural sheet showing partial foundation plan (left) and partial floor framing plan (right) at 1/2" = 1'-0" scale, with foundation notes (101-107) and framing notes (201-204). Includes symbols legend for shearwall and holdown locations.
key_content: Foundation: 4" slab on grade with #4 rebar at 16" O.C. each way
Continuous footing: 15" wide x 18" deep with 2-#4 bars
Foundation bolts: 5/8" diameter, 7" embedment, 48" max spacing, 12" max to ends
Concrete: 2500 PSI, Type V cement, W/C ratio not to exceed 0.45, no special inspection required
Epoxy dowels to existing concrete: Simpson SET SC (ESR#4057), 8" minimum embedment
Headers: 4x6 HDR with trimmer stud U.N.O.
Wall sheathing at shear walls: 3/4" CD APA rated plywood or OSB, 32/16 span rating, 8d common at 4" O.C. edge / 12" O.C. field
Floor sheathing: 15/32" CD APA rated plywood or OSB, 32/16 span rating, 10d common at 6" O.C. edge / 12" O.C. field
Fasteners in contact with PT wood: hot dipped zinc-coated, galvanized, stainless steel, silicon, bronze, or copper
NOT SHOWN: shearwall mark numbers on plan (marks referenced to schedule on S2)
NOT SHOWN: holdown mark numbers on plan (holdowns referenced to detail on S2)

drawing_zones.content: Symbols legend â€” shearwall and holdown symbols with references to S2
Partial Foundation Plan at 1/2" = 1'-0" with footing dimensions and slab callouts
Partial Floor Framing Plan at 1/2" = 1'-0" with joist layout, headers, and blocking
Foundation plan notes (101-107): bolts, concrete, PT wood, epoxy dowels
Framing plan notes (201-204): sheathing, headers, stud wall framing references
